Detailed Description

AppContext (Nucleus) goes hand in hand with Scheduler (Nucleus). It takes control from the Scheduler and starts its own context with the attached Application. Each AppContext has its own Stack as a member variable, m_stack, which is used by the attached Application. All the context information including the Stack pointer to the m_stack is kept within a JmpBuf. So when context switch happens, the Stack pointer to m_stack is retrived from the jump buffer and that m_stack is used by the application for its local data storage. The AppContext also contains a pointer to the current Message, which is then passed to the attached Application on context switch.

virtual void AppContext::MsgLoop (   )  [virtual]
 

Wakes up on Messages and sends them to the attached Application.

Implements AbstractAppContext.

void AppContext::MsgLoop (   )  [virtual]
 

Wakes up on Messages and sends them to the attached Application by calling SendSelf. After processing the Message, it saves the context and switches back to Scheduler's context.

Implements AbstractAppContext.

virtual void AppContext::StartUp (   )  [virtual]
 

Sets up the AppContext for the attached Application and enters MsgLoop.

Reimplemented from AbstractAppContext.

void AppContext::StartUp (   )  [virtual]
 

Starts up the AppContext for the attached Application and goes back to Scheduler's context. Next time it gets back the context it enters into MsgLoop.

Reimplemented from AbstractAppContext.

virtual void AppContext::Wait (  const Condition &  cond  )  [virtual]
 

Stops program flow and waits for the Condition to become TRUE. Incoming Messages will continue to trigger Applications.

Parameters:
cond a reference to the Condition to wait for

Implements AbstractAppContext.

void AppContext::Wait (  const Condition &  cond  )  [virtual]
 

Stops program flow and saves the state and waits in a loop for the Condition to become TRUE. Once the condition becomes true, it will process the incoming Messages.

Parameters:
cond a reference to the Condition to wait for

Implements AbstractAppContext.
